Points.Name: Lair Of Six
Points.ProximityTriggerMessage: Ha! You actually thought I wouldn't put up a fight?

Points.Name: Lair Of Six
Points.ProximityTriggerMessage: You may have bested my brothers and sisters to get here, but you will go no further.
